book.description: Published in 2025, Destruction is a form of creation is an independent literary project that I led and developed alongside a team of talented women.

book.about: The book is a collection of eight magical realism short stories, which began taking shape in 2018 and, after an intense process, was finally published.
book.reach: Today, the book has reached readers in over five countries and is available online.
